summary: Biopic of transgender Muay Thai boxer Parinya Charoenphol who pursued the sport to pay for her gender reassignment surgery.
cast: Asanee Suwan|Sorapong Chatree|Orn-Anong Panyawong|Nukkid Boonthong|Sitiporn Niyom|Somsak Tuangmkuda|Kyôko Inoue|Keagan Kang|Yuka Hyodo|Tanyabuth Songsakul|Sarawuth Tangchit|Natee Pongsopol|Nattama Narkpo|Chayaporn Tometh|Panuwath Kongsamuth|Yingyod Permpoonsap|Padung Kullapat|Nannam Simala|Nopparat Dontapo|Lae Saewang|Supak Pititham|Anurak Sangsuwan|Samnuan Sangpali|Natawuth Singlek|Pat Sasipragym|Denkamol Kiatbussaba|Ittipol Varuthirakorn|Lampangchai Kiatsunanta|Payakpanlan Kiatmongeorn|Anantasak Lukbanyai|Cherrylek Kiatbussaba|Duchkanov Dmitri|Richard Simko|Sasima Vetchasadornkul|Pi Day|Narisara Soneaim|Piruth Tulanon|Nok Usanee|Yuthana Raktham|Kadam Chaipanich|Orasa Kaewkeaukul|Anuchit Nuengniyom|Watchkarn Krinmueng|Napat Puri|Pongsatorn Pankonsung|Kazuhiko Nobukane|Jeffrey Snyder|Nagai Megumi|Marisa Osawa|Shigeki Isawa|David Ismalone|Erik Markus Schuetz|Mahalious Walker|Don Ferguson|Niko Rusakov|Parinya Charoenpol
title: Beautiful Boxer
